title: Uncaught TypeError: can't convert lineWidth to number (Legend and BorderWidth object conflict)
body:
## Expected Behavior
I have got a bar chart with the following configuration:

```javascript
{
    type: 'bar',
    data: {
      labels: ["Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May"],
	  datasets: [{
	  	label: 'dataset',
	  	borderWidth: {top: 2, left: 2, right: 2},
	  	borderColor: "red",
	  	data: [120, 23, 24, 45, 51]
	  }]
    },
    options: {
      responsive: true,
      legend: {
         display: true
      },
   }
} 
```

I'm expecting to have a chart with the legend and the `borderWidth` that I set.

## Current Behavior
With above configuration, there is the following exception:

```javascript
Uncaught TypeError: can't convert lineWidth to number
    drawLegendBox https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:10461
    draw https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:10543
    draw https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:10525
    draw https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:1581
    draw https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:6685
    _update https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:179
    _update https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:160
    _request https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:148
    drawLegendBox https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:10461
    draw https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:10543
    forEach self-hosted:206
    draw https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:10525
    draw https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:1581
    draw https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:6685
    _update https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:179
    forEach self-hosted:1934
    _update https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:160
    _request https://www.chartjs.org/dist/master/chart.js:148
```

If you disable the `legend` or if you don't set the object to`boderWidth`, it works.
It seems the `borderWidth` as object is not managed by legend.

## Steps to Reproduce

Codepen: https://codepen.io/stockinail/pen/BazQKQr

## Environment
* Chart.js version: master/dist
* Browser name and version: 81.0.2
